text:
Love this new Duolingo integration, reminding me that I’m behind on my Hirigana practice. :sweat_smile:

_(Actual bug report: Navigated to the “Companies” page, and the body content switched from English to Hirigana, doesn’t seem to be a way to change it back. Firefox 126.0.1 on MacOS 14.4.1, user agent preferred language is set to English, located in Portland, OR with no VPN enabled.)_
Same here, believe this is french though.
